Thanks for the questions - some good ones in there! :)

This is the first phase of our permanent move over to the updated client - eventually the updated client will be the only client for League. You can read more about the process [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client)

If you have any feedback about the current state of the updated client, I'd strongly suggest you give your feedback on the boards or in a ticket (see how above) so the team can read what you think.

As to differences - up until now the focus has mainly been around ensuring that features of the original client remain available and that the updated client is ready and stable for all players.  Once the update hits worldwide, it unlocks some really cool level-ups in that Rioters can deliver features much faster - there's a [more in-depth FAQ about it all here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ)
